root.name: My Little Pony: Pinkie Pie's Party
root.description: THQ, who brought us Warhammer 40k: Dawn of War, and the upcoming Warhammer 40k: Dawn of War 2 and Red Faction: Guerrilla, gave gamers old and young the opportunity to have pies with a pink pony.Â Players probably eat pies in this game, but I don't know anyone who wants to play this to confirm it.
